documents.document: Today's all about the bullet journal
Really don't understand why people sit next to me on an empty train ... No seats around me reserved and I'm eating ...
@GWRHelp quick question if my sister has a ticket to CDF can she change and go to CDQ without buying a different ticket? Thank you!!
Marathon shoes, there's so many options!! @CarlyRowena @emshelx @niomismart 🙈😭😭
@TheAnnaEdit @BobbiBrown intensive skin Serum foundation #bobbibrownuk
Last day in work before Christmas ⛄️🎄 one thing I ask, please be nice to those who work in retail!
@lilypebbles Bobbi brown lip balm, I swear by it X
@buynowbloglater this is amazing!!! Love them all 😍
Wine & chocolate pairing is my new favourite past time since @justbobbibrown launched the beautiful new Wine & Chocolate collection
@GWRHelp your app said it didn't process my ticket so I booked it online instead, to now find the original ticket had gone through. Refund?
@GWRHelp how do e tickets work in stations with ticket barriers?
@emshelx I do this so often! X
#prideofbritain the world has some truly incredible people!
#GBBOFinal ahhhhhh
1 in 2 of us will suffer from cancer at some point in our lives. Text FIGHT to 70404 to donate £10 to #StandUpToCancer
Does putting your gym clothes on to do the housework count as exercise?
@BethBelle10 this happened to me earlier to! Xx
Days off mean snoozes & films in bed 😴
@CarlyRowena help!! I've just received a place in the london marathon - how the hell do I train for one? 😂🙈 xxx
@BethBelle10 what's this? I never update my phone🙈
@emshelx thank you so much! It looked super cosy xx
@emshelx where's your grey jumper from that you're wearing on your snapchat? 😘
@CarlyRowena I miss those days, although people do surprise me occasionally. So bless you for the next time you sneeze ... 😘
Baked a mocha cake in preparation for #GBBO
@SteakArtCardiff what time do you serve roasts til? 😊
@Cath_Kidston collection with Winnie the Pooh is perfection 😍😍😍
"You're either a red lipstick person, or not" @justbobbibrown so true! Love this quote Bobbi
@GWRHelp if you could be a little more organised over this period of tunnel closure it'd be great! Useless service the last 2 days
@buynowbloglater my thoughts exactly!! Such a shame we view moments through a camera lens
@GWRHelp useful guys, real useful. If I had known I would've set off later from Wales. There's a timetable for a reason
@GWRHelp they've put us on a train to temple meads please can the 16.22 to Portsmouth be held? There's a lot of us on here heading that way
@GWRHelp so how do I get home?
@GWRHelp why has the 4.01 from BPW to Warminster been cancelled?! How do I get home now
Why am I watching taken? Always scares me! 🙈
@buynowbloglater @NikeRunning would love to know any marathon training tips you have 😊 X
I hate trains so much!!! 😭 get me home now
I either need a bar of chocolate or a holiday. I can't decide which!
@GWRHelp so I don't need to get a bus? :)
@GWRHelp can I just check the 18.15 that just left pad to CDF is direct? I don't have to get on a bus do I?
3 hours sleep & a full day in london. Let's do this 💪🏼
@GWRHelp fab thanks Jess!
@GWRHelp would it be quicker to get delayed 5.12 from CDF to PAD or wait for the 6.25? I have an anytime single?
"I would've done it for $500" ... "I would've done it for the experience" 😂😂😂 #justgowithit
Gossip girl marathon - chuck bass 😍😍😍 oh how time has been good to him! https://t.co/9zQY2B4dVO
Totally watching princess diaries 🙈
Train delays, the story of my life!
@GWRHelp I'm heading back to Cardiff later on, will it be open again?
Back to Dorset for a few days 😍
@GWRHelp Newport to BTM - not enough help in the station, no directions to bus, just ended up walking around like a headless chicken
@GWRHelp you're just a shambles, if you're going to offer bus replacement at least be organised with it.
You know you're getting old when you get excited about your new Hoover & the delivery of your food waste caddy!
Why was there no full moon, half moon, total eclipse ... God sake Mary I was on the edge of my seat waiting for you 🙊 #GBBO
@YodelOnline I did this yesterday but no one responded, even though parcel had been rearranged y'day. Don't worry have it now!
@virginmedia hey, I think it's ok now! Thank you though 😊
@YodelOnline you are useless! Rearranged delivery for today, as its my day off, waited in all day. To be told it hasn't even been sent?!
@YodelOnline Hi I rearranged a delivery for today, but haven't received an update - can you let me know if its scheduled today?
@virginmedia my internet keeps dropping in & out, any reason?
My neighbours smoke alarm keeps going off, should I investigate?
I moved into my beautiful flat a month ago, I finally have internet thanks to Edley @virginmedia after BT messed me around so much!
@milkbubbletea this looks insane!! Recipe please?😍😍😍😍
@BTCare I've wasted so much data on my phone, and having to switch to a different provider is really disappointing.
@BTCare I live in a virginmedia only area, took you 4 weeks to tell me after being promised BT, never break promises!!!
@virginmedia thank you so much to Ed on Cardiff queen street after @BTCare gave me the most useless customer service over the last 4 weeks!
@BTCare dale, I've waited to have Internet installed for 4 weeks, mixed messages everyday from bt. I'm going to @virginmedia now. Stupid bt
@BTCare you are the most useless internet suppliers in the world. I can't even comprehend my frustration towards the service I have received
@BTCare Bt engineer came today after waiting 10 days - to be told no line into building so can't have Bt?! Can you update me please!!!
@BTCare how do I make a complaint?
@bt_uk how do I make a complaint to you guys?
@GWRHelp if I buy a return ticket to BRI from CDF can I return from BPW instead?
Both kidneys are hurting now, brilliant.
@CarlyRowena you're the most beautiful person I know, if it wasn't for you I wouldn't even know how to get abs! As long as you're happy 💗💗💗

@DiscerningMan love this review of Bobbi's skincare
https://t.co/dV88JmlNKT https://t.co/vEwltATVub”
Today is going to consist of so many lists ... 🙈
I honestly don't know how I lived with my last washing machine, my new one is 👌🏼
@buynowbloglater hope it went well, sending you lots of love Laura X
Can't believe Argos deliver the same day?! That just saved me so much time, slowly the flat is beginning to look more like a home
Swansea bound!
I can't even begin to explain how stressful moving is ... But I can say my new flat is 👌🏼👌🏼👌🏼
@parcelforce you've just sent me a text to say my parcel is due for delivery between 11.01-12.01 ... I'm out and have 2 mins to get home!
@buynowbloglater this is so lovely Laura!!
I apologise for all the friends quotes ... I just love it so much! 😂
Just had Scott from @Ocado deliver my weekly shop, he brightened up my day so much! What a wonderful positive guy!
@CarlyRowena you have to download the you view app, then you can record everything! Sometimes I find it easier to find programmes on the app
"I wasn't supposed to put beef in the trifle" ... Friends makes everything better
@GWRHelp thanks, is there enough time to change at Newport? X
@GWRHelp why has the 18.30 from CDF to Warminster been cancelled? How can I get there now?
@CarlyRowena how can I be as awesome as you? 😍
The trouble with living in Wales is I now have a lot of Welsh friends ... #ENGWAL c'mon England!!!!
@YodelOnline can you shed light on my parcel situation please? I want to rearrange delivery for tomorrow! Third attempt today!
@YodelOnline ... your website stating they will leave contact details to rearrange delivery date. Happens too often with you guys!
@YodelOnline ... as that's my day off. Please can you assist ASAP as slightly frustrated drivers never fill in cards correctly despite ...
@YodelOnline Green card left y'day with no contact details to rearrange for another day, orange card today. I want to rearrange for Thurs..
I missed a parcel yesterday, and I just know that as soon as I get in the shower the delivery guy will come 🙈
@TheEllenShow makes every morning brighter ☀️
Ahh late to the party, but huge congratulations @CarlyRowena & @leonbusty !!! So happy for you guys, lots of love xxx
Also a huge happy birthday to you @CarlyRowena ❤️🎈
Squealed when I saw this in work today! @CarlyRowena xx https://t.co/RrXFUbR92K
@CharsChance 😂😂😂 that's so funny! I was so jealous he got to meet them! X
@CarlyRowena your weekly video was lovely! You are such a beauty, hope the treatment works for you!! Xxx
Having one of the most relaxing days off, no make up & endless cups of tea ☕️
